questionStem: Which situation is most likely to put someone in a state of **dudgeon**?
answers: receiving a rude and disrespectful comment in front of a group of colleagues
distractors: finding a hidden treasure in the backyard
receiving a promotion at work
taking a relaxing vacation by the beach

questionStem: Which of the following would most likely **glisten**?
answers: a freshly polished diamond under bright lights
distractors: a muddy boot left out in the rain
a dull rock found on a beach
a faded photograph stored in a drawer

questionStem: Which situation best illustrates the word **apparently**?
answers: A person found a phone on a park bench and apparently decided to leave it there for the owner to come back and retrieve.
distractors: A student was apparently absent from class because his alarm didn't go off.
The teacher apparently forgot to assign homework for the weekend.
It was apparently raining heavily outside, so the outdoor concert was canceled.

questionStem: In a school play, each student was given a script with their **respective** lines to memorize. Which of the following scenarios would also require individuals to remember their specific parts?
answers: a group of musicians each playing a different instrument in an orchestra
distractors: a solo musician performing alone on stage
a choir singing in unison
a dance troupe moving in synchronized steps

questionStem: Which of the following is an example of someone being **eloquent**?
answers: a politician delivering a moving speech at a rally
distractors: a student reading quietly in the library
a chef preparing a delicious meal in the kitchen
a child playing on the playground

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best exemplifies a pragmatic approach?
answers: Choosing a cost-effective solution that meets the immediate needs of the project.
distractors: Continually changing plans without considering feasibility.
Ignoring practical considerations in favor of idealistic solutions.
Implementing a strategy solely based on theoretical concepts.

questionStem: In which situation would it be most **prudent** to save money for unexpected expenses?
answers: a medical emergency that requires immediate treatment
distractors: buying a luxury watch as a gift for a friend
going on a shopping spree with a credit card
booking a last-minute vacation without checking the cost

questionStem: Which of the following would most likely require you to show a **certificate**?
answers: graduating from university
distractors: buying groceries at the store
reading a book at the library
walking in the park

questionStem: Which of the following situations would most likely make an employee feel **redundant**?
answers: receiving a notice of termination due to job duplication
distractors: being recognized by the company for outstanding performance
participating in a training program to develop new skills
working closely with team members on a new project

questionStem: Which of the following mysteries would most likely be described as **convoluted**?
answers: a crime novel with multiple plot twists and intricate clues
distractors: a straightforward list of instructions for assembling furniture
a clear and simple explanation of a scientific theory
a smooth and direct road through the countryside

questionStem: Which person would be most likely described as **discerning**?
answers: a book critic who can identify subtle literary themes
distractors: a marathon runner who trains daily
a child learning to tie their shoes for the first time
a musician playing the same song repeatedly without variation

questionStem: Which of the following examples best demonstrates someone being **resilient**?
answers: a student who continues to study hard despite facing multiple failures in exams
distractors: a person who easily gives up when faced with difficulties
a driver who speeds up when faced with a traffic jam
a chef who throws away a dish at the first sign of imperfection

questionStem: Which of the following would likely be used as an **ornament**?
answers: a decorative crystal vase on a mantelpiece
distractors: a hammer in a toolbox
a cookbook in a kitchen cabinet
a compass in a backpack

questionStem: Which scenario below best illustrates a situation that can be described as **ambiguous**?
answers: a cryptic message with multiple interpretations sent to a group of people
distractors: a clear and straightforward user manual for a new software program
a sunny day with blue skies and no clouds
a recipe book with easy-to-follow instructions for baking cookies

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best illustrates an extravagant act?
answers: throwing a lavish party with expensive decorations and gourmet food
distractors: cleaning out the clutter in the garage
fixing a leaking faucet at home
taking a walk in the park on a sunny afternoon

questionStem: Which of the following situations best represents a **surplus**?
answers: a farmer having more crops harvested than needed for the season
distractors: a student receiving a passing grade
a worker being laid off due to lack of demand
a store experiencing a shortage of goods

questionStem: Which of the following actions shows humility?
answers: volunteering at a local shelter without seeking recognition
distractors: bragging about one's achievements on social media
demanding special treatment from others
putting others down to make oneself look better

questionStem: Which of the following scenarios best exemplifies the word **proliferate**?
answers: a species of insect rapidly spreading and establishing itself in a new habitat
distractors: a marathon runner completing a race with a personal record time
a chef creating a new recipe for a popular dish
a musician practicing the same piece of music daily to achieve perfection

questionStem: Which of the following positions would require a specific educational background and experience as part of the **qualification**?
answers: a neurosurgeon at a renowned hospital
distractors: a sales associate in a local retail store
a high school student assisting in a community service program
a volunteer helping at an animal shelter

questionStem: Where is the best place to watch the sunset over the ocean?
answers: a beach along the coast
distractors: a busy city street
a forest hiking trail
an indoor shopping mall
